website_summaries.verdict: Durable, high-quality plastic set that includes everything you need.
pros: Kit comes with free online tutorial videos to help you through the process
Comes with a complete 11-piece set, including a sushi knife and nonstick rice spreader
cons: Lacks that authentic look of a bamboo sushi kit

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, great value
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to make sushi at home for a while and this kit really does the job. After reading some of the reviews, it seemed like it came with good instructional videos...and it does! Definitely helps a lot, because this kit is fun but it's NOT a toy. It's amazing once you get the hang of it though. Really enjoy making sushi with my kids (watch for the knife though...it's a professional sushi knife and it's very sharp!!). If you are trying to save a little money, like DIY stuff and love sushi, this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sushi Kit
customer_reviews.text: Its all affordable and easy to keep into your place called home. The kit is a durable design with accessories made to take hits and bangs on kitchen counters. Its recommendable for making sushi fast and efficiently. I used this product for a birthday party a few times and every time it made excellent shape sushi bites.
customer_reviews.author: FriscoStars

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one, you won't regret it.  ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: This set is AMAZING!!! Makes sushi a snap for absolute beginners. Wonderful instructional content via videos. You only receive the web addresses when you receive your order. I read in one of the top ten sushi making review articles that this kit was great but no instruction. The instruction is with the product and is so wonderfully simple to understand. Love it all around. Amazing quality too!
customer_reviews.author: London xo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sushi maker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love!! My daughter and I love using this. It's a fun dinner night that can involve kids and getting to eat sushi. My daughter is not a fan of fish or nori but the beauty of making your own sushi is getting to pick your ingredients. I got some soy wrappers for her that are pretty good. We make rainbow heart sushi. Only have had this less than a month and we have used it 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very kit makes it easy AND fun to make Sushi!
customer_reviews.text: This kit made it so easy to make Sushi and even though the prepping of the ingredients take a little time to do this kit helps you save time with all that is included to work with. The knife is super sharp and I appreciate that to get a good clean cut for serving the sushi. I like the different shaped options you have with this kit as well. I also love the different spatulas it comes with as well. I love this...no complaints at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Donnelle Griffin

customer_reviews.title: We love sushi! We love this set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is a lot of fun and very forgiving to a few novices. My son wanted sushi for his birthday and we thought it would be more fun to attempt it ourselves. It made some neat shapes which we didn't realize at purchase. There are lots of videos online that are incredibly helpful. The first few attempts were delicious mishaps, but we eventually got the hang of it. It helps to get the roll fairly full to get the full shape effect. So glad we went with this one! Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Ordered as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This set seems great. It was ordered as a gift for someone. My only issue (and the reason I gave it 4 stars) is that it didnt come with instructions. The person it was purchased for is not tech savvy and wouldn't do well trying to look up online instructions. Because of this I had to take screen shots from a video of someone use this and send each one to her so that she could figure out how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C

customer_reviews.title: Easy Sushi
customer_reviews.text: A very simple and fun sushi making kit. Video tutorials help a little but don't seem to cover all of the included tools. We will have to experiment with using the smaller sizes in the kit. Also, we ended up with sushi very full of rice and recommend cutting back on rice to make space for the filling. The kit is dishwasher safe, however, water got trapped in one of the pieces and was tricky to clear out. We will probably wash it by hand in the future. For the price, simplicity and fun...4 stars seems about right.
customer_reviews.author: michael p

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend you spend 15 min watching the video
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my foodie 10 year old. We had a blast making very professional looking sushi. Dad was on call and got called out before we finished eating. He came home st 1am and I found him eating more sushi rolls we put up. This was a hit. Cannot wait to make more. Highly recommend you spend 15 min watching the video.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Delicious sushi!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sushi making kit!!! If you’re thinking about it, just purchase it. I watched the videos by Aya & it helped so much! My fiancé & I didn’t know where to begin so watching the videos made it a breeze. We lightly sprayed the base with avocado oil so it would easily pop out, because our first roll it took us a while to get it to pop out onto the plate even with the squeezing technique from Aya. Our sushi was amazing, close to our favorite restaurants sushi. Definitely start off with minimal ingredients, I bought way too much, which was overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Essential for sushi lovers
customer_reviews.text: The knife alone is worth the price! This kit is a fun way to make sushi and other similar foods. I even used it with a flour tortilla, rice, cheese and avocado. I sprayed it with Pam before putting it together. You can make your sushi in the usual round shape or make it in a triangle or a heart. Be sure to watch the video on youtube for instructions. It's easy!
customer_reviews.author: blanc dragon

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but needs better instruction
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it is easy to cut and no rolling needed. Really wish you would provide tangible instructions along with online video. Also, would be great to put numbers on each piece so we know what goes with what. Video didn't show every single step... Removing sushi for example.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Wannamaker

customer_reviews.title: Sushi
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't successful using these implements. Maybe it's just me, but I couldn't get the slices rolls to come out of the apparatus whole
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only good for the knife
customer_reviews.text: This does not make the rolls tight enough so when you cut the roll with the wonderful knife that is included, the roll falls apart. This kit is only good for the knife. The rest of the kit is trash. So if you need a good knife, get this.
customer_reviews.author: abryant

customer_reviews.title: Fun, messy, and a bit odd!!
customer_reviews.text: When I used this kit it was my first time making sushi. My friend who is Japanese thought it was crazy weird!!! The concept is good but it was a bit difficult to cut as the knife sometimes would not go all the way through and make for some very messy rolls! Overall, it was fun and u should try it if you're interested in making sushi!
customer_reviews.author: Emma M

customer_reviews.title: The tutorial videos are so helpful. Fun to use at home or as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: This product is such a great way to make sushi making at home accessible. I'm a visual learner, so the tutorial videos from users are practical and make using this kit so much easier. I'm not sure I would have been able to make the sushi as well without the videos. I'm impressed that the kit even comes with a a professional knife perfect for cutting the rolls into the proper sizes. I always assumed I'd have to go out to have sushi, but I can't wait to host my own sushi night at my house with the help of this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Morgenstern

customer_reviews.title: its so much fun
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of fun using this product! I was really surprised that it came with an actual knife though lol! The set up is really cute! At first i was discouraged because of all the parts it came with but i easily went onto the website on the box for a tutorial and then taught me everything i needed to know about using the product and showed me tutorials! This is something fun to do with your kids or in my case my younger cousins they absolutely loved it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Antwi

customer_reviews.title: Super easy, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t typically review items but I felt compelled to review this sushi maker because it is FANTASTIC! We are a family of 7 so buying pre made sushi or eating out is expensive. We are able to make our own at home for pennies with leftovers! So easy even my younger kids (ages 9, 11, 12) can make their own. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Great for first timers!
customer_reviews.text: I have never made sushi before this, and the tools and instructional video made it very easy for me to create beautiful sushi within my first try! The guided slots were great so that when I cut my roll, all of the pieces are the same size. I'm so excited to try making the heart sushi, and to expand my sushi capabilities beyond the California roll.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sushi lovers
customer_reviews.text: We love sushi and wanted to try making it at home. Perfect kit for first timers. The entire family had fun making sushi. It is so easy to use. The product is packaged well. There are clear instructions in videos on their website on how to use. I realized it is better to grease all the parts so the sushi comes out of the base easily especially for the square maki maker. Definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool idea, but the instructions are online which is annoying. Also, there's so many pieces that you're not even sure what they're for. We bought this for a sushi date night, but we ended up only using the sushi knife and one piece we THINK was for cutting pieces. The rest of the kit was kind of a waste.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very practical for beginners like me
customer_reviews.text: The kit looks great and the video is very easy to follow. I just need more practice, but to be my first time using it and with no previous experience making sushi rolls, I feel it's just great. My family and me love the results and the final presentation. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Daniel Colon Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Easy Sushi First Time
customer_reviews.text: For someone who has never made sushi, only eaten it a few times at a favorite Thai restaurant, this kit made it so simple. It arrived only one day before I needed to make sushi for our church potluck. The results weren't perfect enough for a restaurant, but two trays of my sushi disappeared at the very beginning of the potluck. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jo Salhany

customer_reviews.title: Sushi too big, plasric mold not rigid
customer_reviews.text: When you put pressure on the mold it bows out a little causing the Nori sheets to move. The knife, as expected, is cheap and not overly sharp. Your finished product is too large and hard to eat as traditional sushi. It isn't bad as much as poorly thought out as far as size goes. I ended up going out and buying a cheap bamboo mat from Wal-Mart which I get better use out of. If you want to make your own sushi rolls watch some videos online and use a mat, you'll save some money and a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: going to take some practise
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product based off of how great the reviews were and how easy it was to make. I was very impressed by the packaging and everything it came with. I think this possibly could be a great product it just might take some time practicing and getting the hang of it. My sushi kept falling apart the first time i made it but other than that it was a fun product for kids or even a date night. I will be trying it again and hoping that it gets easier!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great sushi at HOME!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I was a little skeptical at first that it would really make easy sushi but it does! We have used to twice now and they rolls come out great! The maki rolls are my favorite, because they are smaller, but my husband loves the larger rolls! Will be making a lot of sushi!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Very Informative
customer_reviews.text: I've been interested in making sushi for a while. A friend recommended this kit to me and its been very helpful. The videos are very self explanatory and easy to understand. I now feel like I'm a semi pro sushi maker now. Lol. Its a must have for all aspiring sushi makers
customer_reviews.author: Delayen Weeden

customer_reviews.title: I love this sushi making kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this sushi making kit! Just follow the online videos that accompany this product and you will make perfect sushi rolls every time. I did and if I can do it, you can do it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have rolled my own sushi for a long time. This makes it so much easier and gives creative options. My kids can use it also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Making a ushi is a weeknight staple!
customer_reviews.text: I genuinely love this sushi making tool. I invested in it because I had tried to make sushi at home before and always ended up with an explosion of sticky rice all over the kitchen and no sushi. Attached is a picture of the very first roll I made with this kit- it actually looks like sushi!! And my rolls have gotten even better since then! This little kit is saving us wods on our weekly sushi expenditure and making it fun to make at home. Definitely surpassed my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our teenage sushi-loving son who doesn't care much for cooking. We thought it might inspire him to spend more time in the kitchen. Mission accomplished! He makes gorgeous sushi with it several times a week. Now the whole family has gotten into the act, and we even have special requests for birthday sushi.
customer_reviews.author: GulfCoastRetired

customer_reviews.title: It’s crap
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and did not like it. It is not easy to use and way too much expensive. Buying a $1-3 sushi mat-roller is better than paying for this crap. Not worth it. I should have returned this but I was not able to use it right away as soon as it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Holy

customer_reviews.title: A great sushi tool.
customer_reviews.text: The videos are essential to using this kit. A bit perplexed until I watched the videos and saw the demonstrations. A manual to accompany the kit would be useful as well. I have used the kit several times with no difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Tencody

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use although I think the videos could be done better namely if you want rice on the outside of your rolls. Really, my only complaint is that you cant make the smaller sized rolls with this machine, all of the attachments are pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Made beautiful sushi
customer_reviews.text: The product would have been even easier to use if I understood how the video worked
customer_reviews.author: Michele D. Stratmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Just got this and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this sushi kit and already had a big sushi party with my friends. They loved it, very fun! My 6 year old loves it too! It took a couple of rolls to get it perfect, but the videos are extremely helpful and Aya explains everything very clearly. My little one doesn't like raw fish, so we also made sushi with beef and veggies...It came out great! It’s the perfect sushi kit for someone who has never made sushi before and wants to make tasty and nice looking rolls without having to learn how to use a sushi mat. The heart shaped and round rolls are our favorite. And the knife is SHARP! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit more difficult to make your own sushi to begin with. This one is more tasking than a “bazooka” style sushi maker. Overall it’s good. Ease of use...not for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Dustin F.

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, but does what it says it does. Watch the videos
customer_reviews.author: RG   #tryingtohelp

customer_reviews.title: Great date night fun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for first time sushi makers, and the videos are a plus! Had a great time making sushi with my boyfriend and enjoyed it. Saves $$
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Delivers what it advertises
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use this with my Teenage kids and we had a lot of fun. Instructions were easy and simple to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit, but came missing a few pieces
customer_reviews.text: Item came missing a few parts, but overall was solid and useful. I'd recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: It's a must
customer_reviews.text: Would purchase this again in future easy to use and fun
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make sushi for Valentine’s Day. It was perfect! Made heart shaped rolls very quickly and got it right on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Oak Canyon

customer_reviews.title: 1st time user
customer_reviews.text: As someone who always buys sushi at restaurants i decided to buy this and make my own. So glad i did. This is the easiest to make and with all the gadgets and a very sharp knife. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to make sushi.
customer_reviews.author: carebearmomma4

customer_reviews.title: Fun to make and the more you make the better they get!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit for my husband for Christmas. We tried it last night. He wasn’t interested in watching the videos or making the sushi so I did. My first roll looked a little strange but tasted great. I got better at it the more rolls I made. My husband thought they were delicious and even told me so! We’re already planning another sushi night with new ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah jackson

customer_reviews.title: REALLY cool kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love sushi, but couldn't use a sushi mat to save my life! I just received this kit and 'got right to it'. This kit makes sushi making really easy. Great videos with very helpful and easy step by step instructions. Flexible with all kinds of sushi roll shapes...... and the knife is a great bang for your buck! I'm only just getting started, but can't wait to explore and be creative with this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes sushi easy.
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a wooden version of this product but it was harder to clean and did not have the variety of shapes.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Halstvedt

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use as a first time sushi maker.
customer_reviews.text: Sushi tools were easy to use and dishwasher safe. The tutorial videos were especially important in helping this grandmother and granddaughter to make sushi together for the first time. Would love more videos on the website.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bentz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: Great product but difficult to manage when making rice out rolls
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and create almost perfect sushi! Easy to clean, and good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Edwardsen

customer_reviews.title: Best sushi kit ever!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my sister, It is the best kit in my opinion for anyone from beginner to pro, lots of variety and easy to use and clean. Great gift idea or self buy... you can't go wrong with this sushi kit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this! Easy to use even for an 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sushi kit
customer_reviews.text: I researched sushi kits before purchasing. AYA is the perfect kit. It has its own bag to keep everything together. All the pieces go on the top shelf of the dishwasher. The video is clear to understand. Comes with a lifetime warranty. Happy wife who loves sushi
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Jo T

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE! Everything was in great shape. The delivery came on time. The video from the website helped tremendously. Thanks for a great product! I'm going to buy one for my best friend's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use! Love the video tutorials, it is very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: great for everyone
customer_reviews.text: this is a simple kit that any experience range will find easy to use. I use it at lest once a day you can make your own meals for half the price
customer_reviews.author: clay jeske

customer_reviews.title: The online tutorials cut off mid way and go to ...
customer_reviews.text: The online tutorials cut off mid way and go to the next one. They don't explain which pieces they are using, everything is red and not labeled. There is zero printed information that comes with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: sushi is fun to make now
customer_reviews.text: Made sushi at home,it was a big hit and soooo easy. Very happy with the purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: No headline.
customer_reviews.text: Im sorry, but I had to return it because he already had a sushi maker. It looked very nice."
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excited
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to give this give and see it put to use!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Austin

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a cool gadget. Bought this for my husband and he thinks it is awesome. The knife is super sharp and cuts the Nori easily. You can make different sizes and shapes of sushi. We will be eating a lot of home made sushi in the future.
customer_reviews.author: C Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as wedding gift Love the simple concept, will probably buy myself one for Christmas Arrived in 2 days ✔️✔️✔️✔️
customer_reviews.author: maaaami

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my bf and he absolutely loved it. We tried it out and it was really easy to use. We also liked the different shapes it came with. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The kit was easy to use and understand. The grandchildren each took a turn at making their sushi roll. Ages: 17 and 12.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Young

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! -- EXTREMELY easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!-- EXTREMELY easy to use. First roll a little loose- By 2nd one- it was Perfect! Video on line really helpful- short and to the point! Recommending to Every Sushi Lover!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Watch the videos and you are able to make any roll you want.
customer_reviews.author: Bartachris

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to use, my kids made sushi for me😀. And they did an awesome job!!! Even looked appetizing and tasted great.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter who wants to make sushi at home. We haven’t tried it out yet but she was super excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean P

customer_reviews.title: Sushi Maker
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the job with lots of different pieces to make different kinds of rolls. My only complaint is that the is a learning curve getting the amount of rice correct. My rolls are still a little lumpy and uneven
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Kozak

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect! We made California rolls using the round, smaller tools. Each roll was delicious. We will be using this to get our sushi fix without breaking the bank. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I am happy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, arrive well works great, but you have to lear a little bit how to use it, but nothing stressful, great product overall
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: It is so easy to make sushi now
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected and more. It is so easy to make sushi now, if I could I would have it every night. The product is great, we have sent it as a gift to other family memebers.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lawson

customer_reviews.title: My son's girlfriend love it. And it arrived on time for her ...
customer_reviews.text: My son's girlfriend love it. And it arrived on time for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've never made sushi before using Sushi Aya and this made it super easy to create perfect rolls. The instructional videos on their site were very helpful on how to use it and how to make the sushi rice as well. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie Retzloff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product - sturdy utensils. Loving making sushi with it.
customer_reviews.author: SDSkyAngel

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Was a fun thing to try. Would recommend watching the videos in the little pamphlet given. Once you get used to how to use it it’s very easy to use. An everything is machine washable !
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Strack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They made sushi last night and said it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Brian

customer_reviews.title: Bought it price in mind, but still was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for its "step by step" instructions which were virtually nonexistent. Requires way to much rice to make the rolls. They were extremely filling because of that and not very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The most difficult thing you'll have with this kit is dialing in your assembly quantities of rice and how you want to put your recipe together. Once you figure that out, the rolls will me packed properly and easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this is to use! I made perfect sushi rolls and it was my first time ever making sushi! The videos were helpful in getting me started and I love that all of the items fit back into the storage bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: Put this product to work today after watching the videos. Product works great. My wife just loved the heart shaped sushi I made her for dinner tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Mayor

customer_reviews.title: Good product that needs some additional product support
customer_reviews.text: Device works pretty well. Needs better WRITTEN instructions. Videos are somewhat helpful. Also needs info about how much rice and filling required.
customer_reviews.author: John Tennant

customer_reviews.title: Sushi maker
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used the sushi molds themselves however, the slicing rack and knife are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Chi town Goalie

customer_reviews.title: was very pleased but I don't have feedback yet
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter. She,was very pleased but I don't have feedback yet. Thank you for the prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Thompson

customer_reviews.title: ❤
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and the video's. Customer service not that much. Have been trying to register for a warranty but can't.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Boykin

customer_reviews.title: This is what I have been looking for years..........
customer_reviews.text: Now I can make sushi with brown rice....more healthier for my diet!
customer_reviews.author: shawn t mackey

customer_reviews.title: Really handy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this kit so I could make sushi with my nieces and it seems like it’s really easy to do - Not having to worry about rolling the sushi is a big benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Cheah

customer_reviews.title: Easy a 10 year old can do it just watch videos multiple
customer_reviews.text: The videos helped. I wish however there were instructions. My goddaughter had super fun making the heart sushi.
customer_reviews.author: Tuta Hillard

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as gift, they were very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: The knife is getting the most use, but all the tools are useful.
customer_reviews.author: mdislm

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are beginners at sushi making and this helped us out tremendously! Our sushi was delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Princess D. Cody

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Have not used this kit yet. Got it as a christmas present, but I cant wait to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner kit
customer_reviews.text: Good complete kit, just get seaweed wraps, fillings you want, enjoy. Really easy to use for amateur sushi maker.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love sushi and decided to give this kit a go to make some at home...and this thing works great! Make sure to watch the video tutorials. I usually don’t take time to watch instructions online but these tutorials are really good: fun, short, clear and to the point! I put together a sushi party with my folks and my rolls come out perfect and tasty! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Not as slick as it seems.
customer_reviews.text: The nori kept sticking in the grooves after slicing the sushi roll. All the filling would fall out, especially the end pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Saefke

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: would buy again for a gift for someone who loves sushi!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work very well at all
customer_reviews.text: It looks easy to use on the video but it was very difficult
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lacroix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 10 year old great-niece. Don't know what she thinks of it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W. Flannery-Alderman

customer_reviews.title: As easy to use as it looks in the video
customer_reviews.text: My kids (6 and 9) weee the most enthusiastic about buying this and they love using it as a family treat. It’s a good way to involve the whole family in preparing a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Easy! The videos are so helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use. The videos work perfectly. Step by step instructions online, very convenient. My teenage daughter loves it too. I'm a beginner in the sushi thing. So this kit was perfect. Customer service by seller was great. I had a few questions and they replied within a few hours. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Visa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and helps make sushi making fun and easy! Cleanup is easy too!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Robbins

product_meta.title: Sushi Making Kit - Original AYA Sushi Maker Deluxe - Online Video Tutorials Complete with Sushi Knife 11 Piece Sushi Set - Easy and Fun - Sushi Rolls
feature_bullets: Includes exclusive step-by-step online video tutorials.
11-piece set for sushi rolls of all sizes & shapes, made with your favorite ingredients.
Make mouth-watering sushi in a dash and save your family a trip to the restaurant.
Dishwasher safe, durable material, lifetime warranty and premium customer service.
